name: Flatland Racer
description:
Game Prototype made for the NAG Jam 2015, part of the rAge video game expo.

The game is a simple 3D procedural infinite runner style game, rac to the highest score.

Points are gained the longer you stay alive, blue tiles award additional points, and green tiles slow you down. Avoid red tiles, falling through missing tiles, or falling off the track edge.

Playing with an Xbox 360 Controller is highly recommended.

Hope you enjoy!
